scripts.clean: rimraf css js && mkdirp css js
scripts.build:css: node-sass source/scss --output css --include-path source/scss/_partials --include-path source/scss/_mixins --include-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss --include-path node_modules/motion-ui/src --source-map css
scripts.build:js: browserify -e source/js/opcions.js -o js/opcions.js && browserify -e source/js/opcions-fonts.js -o js/opcions-fonts.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
